name: Education and Childcare
factText: Did you know that if you are a family of 4 with an annual income under $75,000, you might qualify for free or discounted child care through the City of Seattle?

name: Food
factText: Did you know that if you or your family are enrolled in SNAP/use an EBT card or meet other income limits you could get fresh fruits and vegetables at Seattle grocery stores and farmers markets?

name: Transportation
factText: Did you know that the City of Seattle provides free ORCA passes for Seattle Public School students and income-qualified individuals?

name: Utilities
factText: Did you know that if you are a family of 4 with an annual income under $65,000, you might qualify to receive a 60% discount on your Seattle City Light bill and a 50% discount on your Seattle Public Utilities bill?
